name: Maze Curse
description:
Maze Curse is a survivor-horror where you should find the exit of a maze and escape a mummy.

It is a game by 1D6 a group of Bellecour Ecole Students with :

Jonathan Ruby - Lead Programmer

Kiyan Forestier - Lead Artist

François Place - Assistant Programmer and Q.A Tester

Simon Chatelus - Project Leader and Level Designer

Facebook/Twitter : MazeCurse
